description:
This table stores paging parameters for different cells in a 5G (NR) network.

- dateTime: Timestamp of the paging parameter configuration.
- Area_Name: Name of the geographical area (e.g., cell site location).
- CellId: Unique identifier of the cell.
- Id2: Redundant or alternative cell identifier.
- Id3: Likely an additional identifier (requires further context for definitive meaning).
- vsDataType: Type of data, specifying this record as paging data.
- vsDataFormatVersion: Version of the data format used.
- Paging.nS: Number of paging attempts.
- Paging.defaultPagingCycle: Default paging cycle duration.
- Paging.pagingId: Identifier for the paging configuration.
- Paging.n: Paging cycle type indicator (likely a flag).
- Paging.nBNbIot: Paging cycle for NB-IoT devices.
- Paging.pagingDiscardTimerEdrxNb: Discard timer for eDRX in NB-IoT.
- Paging.pagingDiscardTimerDrxNb: Discard timer for DRX in NB-IoT.
- Paging.noOfDefPagCyclPrim: Number of default paging cycles.
- Paging.maxNoOfPagingRecords: Maximum number of paging records.
- Paging.defaultPagingCycleNbIot: Default paging cycle for NB-IoT.
- Paging.pagingDiscardTimerEdrx: Discard timer for eDRX.
- Paging.maxNoOfPagingRecordsNb: Maximum number of paging records for NB-IoT.
- Paging.nB: Paging cycle type indicator (likely a flag).
- Paging.nBBr: Paging cycle type indicator (likely a flag).
- Paging.pagingDiscardTimerDrx: Discard timer for DRX.
queries: Show me all paging parameters for CellId 12345 where Area_Name is 'Downtown'.
What is the default paging cycle for NB-IoT devices in Area_Name 'Suburbia' at dateTime 2024-10-27 10:00:00?
Retrieve Paging.pagingDiscardTimerDrx for all cells with Paging.nS > 3.
How many paging records (maxNoOfPagingRecords) are allowed for CellId 67890?
Give me the distinct values of Paging.n, Paging.nB, and Paging.nBBr in Area_Name 'Airport'.
